missing_evidence: Obtain statements from neighbors and nearby residents.
Check for forensic reports (fingerprints, DNA analysis, blood spatter analysis).
Collect phone records and call logs if applicable.
Verify alibis and cross-check with CCTV timestamps.

files.summary:
CCTV FRAME DESCRIPTION

Location: Sai Apartment Main Gate
Camera ID: CAM-02
Date: 14 March 2025
Time Visible on Frame: 08:01 PM

Notes:
The video shows the accused standing near the gate wearing a red shirt and black trousers. The complainant arrives at 08:03 PM. The confrontation begins around 08:08 PM.

FIRST INFORMATION REPORT (FIR)

Police Station: Shivaji Nagar Police Station, Pune
FIR No: 118/2025
Date: 14 March 2025
Time: 08:45 PM

Complainant:
Name: Rohan Kulkarni
Address: Flat 203, Sai Apartment, FC Road, Pune
Phone: 9876543210

Accused:
Name: Akash Verma
Age: 28
Occupation: Delivery Boy
Address: 12/A, Modern Colony, Pune

Incident Description:
On 14 March 2025, around 8 PM, the accused Akash Verma started an argument with the complainant regarding a payment issue near Sai Apartment gate

HOSPITAL MEDICAL INJURY REPORT

Case Reference: CR-5541/2025
Patient Name: Rohan Kulkarni
Age: 29
Date of Examination: 14 March 2025
Hospital: CityCare Hospital, Pune

Findings:
- 3 cm deep cut wound on left arm
- Caused by: sharp object (likely knife)
- Bleeding moderate
- No fracture or major blood vessel injury

Doctor's Note:
Injury type consistent with assault involving a pointed sharp object.

evidence_map.consolidated_text:
CCTV FRAME DESCRIPTION

Location: Sai Apartment Main Gate

Notes:
The video shows the accused standing near the gate wearing a red shirt and black trousers. The complainant arrives at 08:03 PM. The confrontation begins around 08:08 PM.

---
FIRST INFORMATION REPORT (FIR)

Police Station: Shivaji Nagar Police Station, Pune
FIR No: 118/2025
Date: 14 March 2025
Time: 08:45 PM

Complainant:
Name: Rohan Kulkarni
Address: Flat 203, Sai Apartment, FC Road, Pune
Phone: 9876543210

Accused:
Name: Akash Verma
Age: 28
Occupation: Delivery Boy
Address: 12/A, Modern Colony, Pune

Incident Description:
On 14 March 2025, around 8 PM, the accused Akash Verma started an argument with the complainant regarding a payment issue near Sai Apartment gate. The argument escalated and the accused attacked the complainant with a small knife, causing an injury on the left arm.

Witnesses:
1) Priya Sharma ‚Äì Neighbor
2) Security Guard ‚Äì Sai Apartment

Sections Applied:
IPC 324 ‚Äì Voluntarily causing hurt by dangerous weapons
IPC 504 ‚Äì Intentional insult with intent to provoke breach of peace

Action Taken:
Statement recorded, medical check-up completed, CCTV requested from Society office.

---
HOSPITAL MEDICAL INJURY REPORT

Case Reference: CR-5541/2025
Patient Name: Rohan Kulkarni
Age: 29
Date of Examination: 14 March 2025
Hospital: CityCare Hospital, Pune

Findings:
- 3 cm deep cut wound on left arm
- Caused by: sharp object (likely knife)
- Bleeding moderate
- No fracture or major blood vessel injury

Doctor's Note:
Injury type consistent with assault involving a pointed sharp object.
